title: Cheesy baked risotto with courgette and tomato
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '180g risotto rice', '375ml vegetable stock', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 courgettes, sliced', '60g grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 tablespoons shaved Parmesan cheese, for garnish', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat leaf parsley']
